OpenLayers 4 R Quick start 1 Install openlayers 2 Attach the namespace 3 Create a new map object 4 Add tiles 5 Add some features 6 Render the map

OpenLayers 4 R Stefan Kuethe 2017-09-03 Quick start 1 Install openlayers You can install openlayers 4 R from github with: devtools::install_github("crazycapivara/openlayers") 2 Attach the namespace library(openlayers) 3 Create a new map object map <- ol() 4 Add tiles map <- ol() %>% add_osm_tiles() 5 Add some features map <- ol() %>% add_stamen_tiles() %>% add_features(geojsonio::us_cities[1:5, ], style = icon_style()) 6 Render the map map
